A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Bad pacing\, inconsistent characterization\, writing that is obviously contrived for ~drama~ rather than anything else. I can see why Mark Hamill and Oscar Isaac didn't like this\, and why Daisy Ridley doesn't want to play Rey after the trilogy's over. As a lifelong fan I feel let down and I don't think I'm going to watch the next one. :/
